CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED (VERSION 3.0)

IF (BUILD_TESTING)
    SET (BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
    SET (gtest_force_shared_crt ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

    IF (LINUX)
        SET (CXXFLAGS "${CXXFLAGS} -Wno-error=deprecated-copy")
    ENDIF ()

    ADD_SUBDIRECTORY (googletest)
ENDIF (BUILD_TESTING)
